task.title: Changing gears
task.shortdesc: The gear lever is used to switch between the different gears to allow you to drive the car.

taskbody.prereq: Depress the clutch foot pedal to engage a gear.

context.p: The lever is centrally situated and defaults to neutral gear.
From the neutral position, move the lever:

step.cmd: left and forwards to select first gear.
left and backwards to select second gear.
right and backwards to select reverse gear.
